title: Tiny Spec on a Floating Orb in an Infinite Universe
author: Camryn Carmouche
body: The perfect place and time. That is where we are. Who put this here? The mountains, the oceans, the rivers, the waterfalls, the volcanoes, The wind, the fire, the art, the joy, the love, the murder and the life. We are just human.
category: how do we make sense of it all
